languages.text: "Шерин... почему из всех ксеносов, которых ты мог{mf||ла} взять в свиту, ты предпоч{mf|ел|ла} не понимающих моей иронии?"
"Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"
languages.original_text: "Шерин... почему из всех ксеносов, которых ты мог{mf||ла} взять в свиту, ты предпоч{mf|ел|ла} не понимающих моей иронии?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Dites-moi, shereen... Pourquoi faut-il que, parmi tous les xénos que vous auriez pu recruter, vous ayez choisi ceux qui sont hermétiques à mes persiflages ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, shereen... Pourquoi faut-il que, parmi tous les xénos que vous auriez pu recruter, vous ayez choisi ceux qui sont hermétiques à mes persiflages ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン、教えてちょうだい…どうして取り込むことができたはずの異種族の中から、あたしの皮肉を理解しようとしないようなヤツを選んだりしたの？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、教えてちょうだい…どうして取り込むことができたはずの異種族の中から、あたしの皮肉を理解しようとしないようなヤツを選んだりしたの？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的，我真好奇……你明明有那么多异形可以选，可你怎么偏偏挑了这么两个连反话都听不懂的傻子呢？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，我真好奇……你明明有那么多异形可以选，可你怎么偏偏挑了这么两个连反话都听不懂的傻子呢？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen, sagt ... warum habt Ihr von allen Xenos, die Ihr unter Eure Fittiche hättet nehmen können, ausgerechnet jene gewählt, die sich weigern, meinen Sarkasmus zu verstehen?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, sagt ... warum habt Ihr von allen Xenos, die Ihr unter Eure Fittiche hättet nehmen können, ausgerechnet jene gewählt, die sich weigern, meinen Sarkasmus zu verstehen?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Shereen, dime... ¿Por qué, habiendo tantos xenos a los que podías haber acogido, has tenido que elegir a los que son incapaces de comprender el sarcasmo?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, dime... ¿Por qué, habiendo tantos xenos a los que podías haber acogido, has tenido que elegir a los que son incapaces de comprender el sarcasmo?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim... Onca zeno içinde, neden ironiden en anlamayanlara kol kanat gerdiğini söyler misin bana?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, tell me... why is it that, of all the xenos you could have taken under your wing, you picked the ones who refuse to understand my sarcasm?"

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim... Onca zeno içinde, neden ironiden en anlamayanlara kol kanat gerdiğini söyler misin bana?"
